Interface Instruction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RestSeq
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Add, And, Arithmetics, BF, BooleanCond, BT, Div, Dup, Equals, Flip, GreaterThan, Halt, In, Jump, JumpIND, Jumps, LessOrEqual, LessThan, Load, LoadIND, Mul, Neg, Not, NumericCond, Or, Out, Pop, Push, RBF, RBT, RJump, Store, StoreIND, Sub

    public interface Instruction
    Interfaz para las instrucciones
    Author:
    Miguel Ascanio Gómez, Guillermo Romero Alonso

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute(CPU cpu)
             throws InstructionExecutionException
        Ejecuta la instrucción sobre la CPU cpu
        Parameters:
        cpu - CPU sobre la que se ejecuta la instruccion
        Throws:
        InstructionExecutionException - si ocurre error de ejecución

      • parse

        Instruction parse(java.lang.String[] s)
        Parsea la instrucción referente a s
        Parameters:
        s - String a parsear
        Returns:
        new intruccion referente a s
